document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">An </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">honest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">Tear </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">durabler </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">Bronze </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">This </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">Cenotaph </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">May </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">each </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">dies </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">Reared </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">itself </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Deputy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">suffice </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">Gratitude </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">bears </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">Obelisk </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">decays </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: An honest tear
